summary: The DragonThorn is a large tower complete with crafting stations, alchemy garden, and lots of places to store and show off your loot
descriptionHtml:
=== The DragonThorn Tower ===

This is a player home I created for myself but thought I would share with anyone who might want to use it.

Features:
• 25 fully function book shelves
• 3 mounting plaques for weapons
• 4 mounting plaques for shields
• 8 Weapon rack mounts
• 7 Mannequins
• 2 Dagger display cases
• 3 Other display cases
• Lots of chests
• A double bed for our hero
• A lovely alchemy garden and retreat
• Map icon and fast travel enabled from inside as well!
• Crafting benches for cooking, smithing, alchemy, enchanting, and weapon/armor improvement
• A shrine
• Guest bedroom and one live in guest (will be making her and another merchant for selling)

===Fixed log thingy ===
♥ Fixed smithing area
♥ Fixed floating display cases

There are a couple of areas that I could add more to, so if you have any ideas please post them and I will see what I can do. Also, if you find any bugs post those as well so I can fix them up.
author: Hobo Lyra
